2012-05-01.headline: Jim Cramer Candidly Explains Hedge Fund Manipulation
2012-05-01.description: <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UrL_12Dsdwo" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>Jim Cramer spends nearly 11 minutes candidly explaining how to manipulate the market. He literally encourages HFs to perform illegal actions and says that it doesn't matter because they won't get caught.
